amendment.description: To provide funds to reduce or eliminate the use of plastic straws in facilities under the care of the Architect of the Capitol.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3053 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3053 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Coons to Amendment SA 2910. (consideration: CR S4333; text: CR S4334) To provide funds to reduce or eliminate the use of plastic straws in facilities under the care of the Architect of the Capitol.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3053 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3053 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Coons to Amendment SA 2910.
